sentence.Network_en: When it comes to blatant lies, there are none more egregious than budget figures
sentence.Network_cn: 谈到公众谎言，没有比预算数字更令人震惊的

sentence.Network_en: At worst some egregious minion had conducted a childish private enterprise.
sentence.Network_cn: 这最多也不过是一批低能的小人物自己干的无聊把戏而已.

sentence.Network_en: What an egregious example was here !
sentence.Network_cn: 现摆着一个多么触目惊心的例子 啊 !

egalitarian 主张人人平等的egregious 过分的，惊人的elated 得意洋洋的

list.abs: exaggerated actions and egregious expressions will increase the wrinkles of face . so are harmful for beauty habitual laughter , frowning , winking , and making a face , etc .夸张的动作和过分的表情会使面部增多皱纹，所以经常大笑、皱眉、眯眼、做鬼脸等等对美丽有害无益。
if it's really , it's very egregious message .如果这是真的，这肯定是非常惊人的消息。
Shares of the most egregious mortgage lenders have plunged and dozens have gonebust ., 最惊人的抵押贷款贷方股票已经下降 , 还有数十家已经破产.
China is probably the most egregious example of a country that should long since have from World Bank borrowing .中国也许是最突出的例子，这样的国家早就不该获得世行贷款了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin egregius 'illustrious', literally 'standing out from the flock', from ex- 'out' + grex, greg- 'flock'. The derogatory sense (late 16th cent.) probably arose as an ironical use

entry.tran: 极坏的;极差的;极其恶劣的

example.ex: ...the most egregious abuses of human rights.

means.word_mean: 1. conspicuously and outrageously bad or reprehensible;

auth_sentence.content: Furthermore the Yucca Mountain inclusion here is particularly egregious.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Furthermore the Yucca Mountain inclusion here is particularly egregious.

auth_sentence.content: This is egregious, but by no means exceptional.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is egregious, but by no means exceptional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is egregious, but by no means exceptional.

auth_sentence.content: Punjab is the most egregious example, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Punjab is the most egregious example, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Punjab is the most egregious example, he said.

stems_affixes.word_buile: g增加+greg群体+ate……的→adj.合计的, 集合的
con一起+greg集合+ate……的→集合到一起→聚集的
e出+greg群体+ious……的→除了一般的团体→过分的
ag加强+greg群体+ation表名词→n.聚集,总合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分离,隔离;种族差别待遇
stems_affixes.word_buile: segregate[v.隔离]+ion表名词→n.分离,隔离;种族差别待遇
dis分开+aggregate聚合→聚合的东西分开
se分开+greg群+ate使……→使……和人群分开→隔离
